channel.title: Help with getting the Server running. (Sorry)
channel.description:
Hey guys, after following the various guides for setting up a Private server with Moparscape 3.2, I have got the Client and also a server named TestScape Source.
My Compiler is formatted as follows:
@echo off title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
And Runserver as follows:
@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause
I am using SDK 6 update 13. The problem that is occuring is that once running Compile, the follow message displays: "Note: stream.java uses or overrides a depreciated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:depreciation for details. Press any key to continue . . ."
Another issue is when running Runserver, the following appears:
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program of batch file. Press any key to continue...
Can someone please help me? Would love to get this server running ^.^

Configure your environmental variables.

item.title: Help with getting the Server running. (Sorry)
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

well the compiler one is fine it means its compiled.

try putting this in your runserver

@echo off color 4a title blah blahhhh java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic

item.title: Help with getting the Server running. (Sorry)
item.dc:creator: @LeetBix LeetBix
item.description:
@LeetBix wrote:

Hey guys, after following the various guides for setting up a Private server with Moparscape 3.2, I have got the Client and also a server named TestScape Source.

My Compiler is formatted as follows:

@echo off
title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

And Runserver as follows:

@echo off
title Runserver
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

I am using SDK 6 update 13. The problem that is occuring is that once running Compile, the follow message displays:
“Note: stream.java uses or overrides a depreciated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:depreciation for details.
Press any key to continue . . .”

Another issue is when running Runserver, the following appears:

‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program of batch file.
Press any key to continue…

Can someone please help me? Would love to get this server running ^.^

Read full topic
item.source: Help with getting the Server running. (Sorry)
